text: Samantha Gwendoline Cameron, Baroness Cameron of Chipping Norton (n√©e Sheffield; born 18 April 1971) is a British businesswoman. She is the wife of David Cameron, who was Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2016. Until 13 May 2010, Cameron was the Creative Director of Smythson of Bond Street. ==References== Category:Businesspeople from London Category:British philanthropists Category:Spouses of prime ministers of the United Kingdom Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Samantha Cameron
